entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 08:42 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 9.0°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 13 January 2023
